creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
There are still quite a few references to Jakarta Commons and even Jakarta Tomcat in the documentation.

Patch to follow

Comment on attachment 23894
rewrite jakarta references

The patch is bad. It incorrectly changes the DTD for the mbeans descriptors and breaks the tag libraries in the examples web app.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: An alternative patch has been applied to trunk.

The doc changes have been applied to 6.0.x
The code changes have been proposed for 6.0.x
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: This has been fixed in 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.21 onwards.
